newsitem.title: POLAND: WARSAW BOURSE SEEN EXTENDING ONE-SESSION LOSS.
newsitem.headline: WARSAW BOURSE SEEN EXTENDING ONE-SESSION LOSS.

text.p: Polish shares were expected to fall for the second consecutive session in profit-taking after the market had jumped 3.7 percent in the previous three sessions, analysts said.
They said, however, any falls should not be deep and the market should maintain its seven-week horizontal trend in the longer-term.
Analysts said carpet maker Lentex SA, which enters bourse' main market on Thursday, might start trade well above its issue price of 21.5 zlotys.
